verses.english: For the accustomed security of the Quraysh -
Their accustomed security [in] the caravan of winter and summer -
verses.hausa: Sãbonsu na tafiyar hunturu da ta bazara.

verses.english: Let them worship the Lord of this House,
verses.hausa: Sabõda haka sai su bauta wa Ubangijin wannan Gida (Ka'abah).

verses.arabic: ٱلَّذِىٓ أَطْعَمَهُم مِّن جُوعٍ وَءَامَنَهُم مِّنْ خَوْفٍۭ
verses.english: Who has fed them, [saving them] from hunger and made them safe, [saving them] from fear.
verses.hausa: wanda Ya ciyar da su (Ya hana su) daga yunwa, kuma Ya amintar da su daga wani tsõro.
